backend/main.mo: Actor exposes a transform query calling OutCall.transform and a helper for performing HTTP GET outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing CO₂ chart color updates and listing related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH colors, dark mode variants, and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the TemperatureDashboardPage.
frontend/src/components/CO2Chart.tsx: Recharts CO₂ chart showing three CO₂ series with tooltips, legends, timestamp formatting, and brush-based range control.
frontend/src/components/CoolingHeatingVe: Chart rendering scaled Cooling, Heating, and Ventilation percentage values with synchronized range controls and formatted tooltips.
frontend/src/components/DashboardCard.ts: Reusable card wrapper providing styled headers, titles, optional actions, and content layout for dashboard sections.
frontend/src/components/FanVoltageFlowCo: Chart displaying fan voltages and pressure (Pa) with dual Y-axes, formatted tooltips, and brush-based range selection.
frontend/src/components/TemperatureChart: Renders a responsive Recharts line chart for temperature data with custom tooltips, legends, and brush-based range selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking through React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend canister queries; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncedTimeWindow.t: Manages a zoomable time window over data, exposing the visible range and controls to set or reset it.
Fetches and periodically refetches temperature data from an external source while tracking loading and update state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark mode with olive‑accented color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/temperatureDataSource.t: Fetches raw data from a Google Apps Script endpoint and converts it into parsed temperature data points.
frontend/src/lib/temperatureParsing.ts: Parses raw temperature/CO2 data, normalizes numeric fields and timestamps, and filters out invalid entries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/TemperatureDashboardP: Page component that displays temperature-related dashboards with charts, theme toggling, refresh controls, and synced time-window handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, known issues, and feature requests related to adjusting CO2 chart colors.
